articles.title: Donations for late Queen given to fuel bill charity - BBC
articles.description: Money donated in memory of Queen Elizabeth is being used to help those unable to pay energy bills.
articles.content:
Money donated in memory of Queen Elizabeth is being given by King Charles to a charity helping people unable to pay their fuel bills.
